summary: Proposal to create a shared dependency package that both the worker and client packages can depend on, reducing duplication and improving maintainability across the TypeScript SDK.
userImpact: Reduces SDK complexity and improves long-term maintainability by eliminating shared dependency duplication between worker and client packages.
proposedFix: Create a lower-level shared dependency package that both worker and client packages can depend on.
resolutionDetails: Implemented shared dependency package for worker and client
keyQuote: Any reason not to just make a lower dep they can share?
